weekly_top_story.headline: CMS Launches Initiative to Verify Citizenship and Immigration Status for Medicaid and CHIP Enrollees
weekly_top_story.summary: The Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services (CMS) has initiated a new program to verify the citizenship and immigration status of individuals enrolled in Medicaid and CHIP, aiming to reduce improper payments and ensure program integrity.
weekly_top_story.source: Alston & Bird Health Care Week in Review

stories.headline: Artera Receives FDA De Novo Authorization for AI-Powered Prostate Cancer Prognosis Tool
stories.summary: Artera obtained FDA De Novo clearance for ArteraAI Prostate, an AI-based software that predicts long-term outcomes and mortality risk for patients with non-metastatic prostate cancer using digital pathology images, potentially improving personalized patient care.

stories.headline: Study Finds Remote Patient Monitoring Detects Undiagnosed Atrial Fibrillation After Cardiac Surgery
stories.summary: A Brigham and Women's Hospital study revealed that wearable ECG patches using remote patient monitoring can identify atrial fibrillation events in nearly 40% of post-cardiac surgery patients, which were previously undetected after discharge, improving postoperative care and outcomes.
stories.source: HIT Consultant via Open Loop Health
